alert.note: Alert for San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Freeze Warning issued April 03 at 11:05PM PDT until April 04 at 8:00AM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...FREEZE WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 3 AM TO 8 AM PDT TUESDAY... ...WIND ADVISORY HAS EXPIRED... * WHAT...Sub-freezing temperatures as low as 29 expected. * WHERE...Southern Salinas Valley and San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys. * WHEN...From 3 AM to 8 AM PDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Frost and freeze conditions will kill crops and other sensitive vegetation. Extended exposure to cold can cause hypothermia for animals and people. Vehicle windshields will be frosted.
info.instruction: Take steps now to protect tender plants from the cold. Plan for extra time to defrost vehicle windshields.

area.areaDesc: San Luis Obispo County Interior Valleys; Southern Salinas Valley
